definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Like a 24hr convenience store, being there when you need it.
sentences.chinese: 像24小時的便利商店，在你需要的時候出現。

sentences.english: No problem. Where is the nearest convenience store?
sentences.chinese: 沒問題。最近的便利商店在哪裏？

sentences.english: For fare that the electricity will cut off, people storm into convenience store to grab candles.
sentences.chinese: 爲了勉於斷電之苦，人們踊進便利商店搶購蠟燭。

sentences.english: The Changs own a convenience store in Taichung.
sentences.chinese: 張氏全家人在臺中擁有一家便利商店。

sentences.english: There are convenience stores on almost every street corner.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎每個巷口都有便利商店。

sentences.english: Death to all who steal other people's umbrellas at convenience stores on rainy days.
sentences.chinese: 所有在雨天偷竊便利商店門口傘的人都去死吧。

sentences.english: Many gas stations and convenience stores in Asia offer prepaid card.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲許多加油站和便利商店提供了預付卡。

sentences.english: Every convenience store smell egg with tea leaf flavor.
sentences.chinese: 每一間便利商店都充滿着茶葉蛋的味道。

sentences.english: There are two convenience stores in my neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 我家附近有兩家便利商店。

sentences.english: I stop at a convenience store.
sentences.chinese: 我在便利商店停了一下。

sentences.english: Her father owns a chain of convenience stores.
sentences.chinese: 她的父親是便利商店連鎖店的老闆。

sentences.english: It can be bought practically anywhere at kiosks and convenience stores.
sentences.chinese: 這種雨傘在每一個報亭或是便利商店都輕易可以買到。

sentences.english: After I made it to the convenience store, there were only a few items left on the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 我好不容易到了便利商店，貨架上僅剩下一些物品。

sentences.english: You can even get these drugs over the counter at convenience stores or supermarkets.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以在便利商店或超市的櫃檯上隨意購買。

sentences.english: There was a heist at a convenience store in my neighborhood last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我家附近的便利商店發生搶案。

definition: dessert parlor serving mainly cold sweets (esp. shaved ice) (Tw)
EasyCard, smartcard used for payment on public transport and at other businesses such as convenience stores in Taipei and surrounding areas
